name: Spread (MyIndieDemo) (MyIndieDemo)
description:
Introduction

You developed a strange disease. It also blesses you with the power to control vine plants. Your mom took you to a small, mysterious town to find a cure. 

In the middle of the night, a loud noise woke you. You couldn't find your mom anywhere.  What's worse, the hotel has turned into a creepy death trap...

Dev Note

Been working on this first horror game for months! 

Comments and feedback will be much appreaciated :)

Approximate Playtime: 10 ~ 20 minutes

Controls

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

E to interact with objects

E + mouse click to trigger vine growth
